description:
🚀 Get your free KwesForms account now 👉 https://kirr.co/4541r8 (affiliate link) or https://kwesforms.com (non-affiliate).

Do I actually use this KwesForms DevTool? Yes!! And it's live at https://www.mvplanding.com

It's true, I like Google Forms but they fall short (and always have) when it comes to design control. KwesForms gives you the control back by turning your HTML Forms into backend-connected HTML forms that can be integrated to Google Sheets via no-code workflows (Zapier), your own webhooks, or your own requests to the KwesForms API.

💻 Code: https://github.com/codingforentrepreneurs/kwesforms-landing
Promo Code: 20OFFY (save 20%)

00:00:00 Welcome
00:01:20 0 to Deployed with KwesForms and GitHub Pages
00:11:23 New Input + New Styles
00:16:41 Edit Locally with VSCode
00:18:03 Using Flowbite TailwindCSS Components
00:24:35 Redirect after Form Submission

00:34:56 Custom Validation for Email Fields
00:42:51 Aut
title: Skip Google Forms, Use this DevTool Instead
